capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was just talking to someone about the new Harry Potter exhibit and they mentioned that McGonagall's eyes are actually shaped like square lenses. I have to say, I completely agree with them - it's a really interesting observation.
capsules_submitted.reply: i did not know that! i've never heard of square lenses before, valeria, can you tell me more about them?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think McGonagall's glasses are really cool. I mean, who wouldn't want to look like a pair of magical lenses? She's just so elegant and sophisticated with them on, don't you agree?
capsules_submitted.reply: this sounds familiar. valeria mentioned that mcgonagall wears square lenses.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think McGonagall's glasses are really cool, I mean, who wouldn't want to be able to see through solid objects? But at the same time, they do make her look a bit... stern. TRIPLE: mcgonagall looks square-lenses PERSPECTIVE: certainty 0.8 polarity positive sentiment neutral emotion
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what character is behind the square lenses?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville's lineage is indeed quite impressive. I mean, being a pure-blood wizard from the famous Black family is no easy feat. He's got a rich history and a strong sense of heritage that's hard to ignore.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of neville before, can you tell me more about him?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that's definitely true.
capsules_submitted.reply: interesting! i've never met anyone as young as you, valeria   an 11 year old is really quite young!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville is 11 years old. I've confirmed that information, and I'm quite certain it's accurate.

Neville is only 11 years old, you know. I think that's still pretty young for some kids to be starting school, but I guess it depends on the country and the system they're in. (CERTAINTY: HIGH) (POLARITY: NEUTRAL) (SENTIMENT: CALM) (EMOTION: CONCERNED)
capsules_submitted.reply: i know. valeria told me that neville is eleven years old.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Neville is only 11 years old, you know. I think that's still pretty young for some kids to be learning how to read and write on their own. (SENTIMENT: CONCERN)
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what does neville attribute to?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Neville's belongings include a toad. I'm pretty sure about that, and it sounds like a rather unusual item for someone to own.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of a toad before, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been talking to Neville about his belongings and apparently he has a toad. I'm pretty sure that's what he said, so I'd say it's confirmed.
